Malice:
 
"Good, the will is a powerful thing.  But also a fragile thing.  But you know that, right?"
Malice freed his sword arm and wrapped it around Blacknightmare, and now he was holding her close still looking deep into her optics.  His energy field changed, from white to red.  This new destructive field began to eat away at the floor, and would soon begin to damage Blacknightmare.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"My wish to fight still is alive"said the feem while her face was 
closest to Malice's "And your's???"

<DIV>Malice:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"Good, the will is a powerful thing.  But also a fragile thing.  But you know that, right?"</DIV>
<DIV>Malice freed his sword arm and wrapped it around Blacknightmare, and now he was holding her close still looking deep into her optics.  His energy field changed, from white to red.  This new destructive field began to eat away at the floor, and would soon begin to damage Blacknightmare.<BR><BR><B><I>airly2000 <airly2002@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
